title: Talking Letters
description: An interactive alphabet where kindergarten students click on letters to hear them spoken aloud using the Web Speech API.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Reading
Letter Recognition
Phonics
Alphabet

learningObjectives: Recognize all 26 letters of the alphabet (uppercase and lowercase)
Associate the visual shape of each letter with its spoken name
Understand the difference between uppercase and lowercase letter forms

controls.name: Show lowercase
controls.description: Toggle between uppercase and lowercase letter display

controls.name: Letter boxes
controls.description: Click any letter to hear it spoken aloud

simulation.assumptions: Uses browser default voice for text-to-speech

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of talking letters
Explore talking letters through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of talking letters to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on talking letters
